header.image-text: IMAGE OF TRASH ITEM TO UPLOAD
header.subtitle: This is an early demo, so the model may be wrong a lot of times
header.description: A waste sorter is a machine or system designed to separate different types of waste materials based on their characteristics or composition. Its main purpose is to automate the process of sorting waste, making it more efficient and effective than manual sorting.

prediction.green: This is glass, throw it in the green trashbin!
prediction.blue: This is domestic waste, throw it in the blue trashbin!
prediction.yellow: That can be recycled and put in the yellow trashbin!

footer.model: from which the model is exported
